parameters.name: AccessConfigurationId
parameters.description: The ID of the access configuration.

parameters.name: InlinePolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the inline policy.

parameters.name: NewInlinePolicyDocument
parameters.description:
The new configurations of the inline policy.

The value can be up to 4,096 characters in length.

For more information about the syntax and structure of RAM policies, see [Policy syntax and structure](~~93739~~).
